## Checklist

<!-- Mark completed items with [x] -->

- [ ] Tests added or updated
- [ ] All tests pass (`npm run test:run`)
- [ ] Build succeeds (`npm run build`)
- [ ] Linter passes (`npm run lint`)
- [ ] Documentation updated (README, inline comments, etc.)
- [ ] Accessibility verified (keyboard navigation, ARIA, screen reader)
- [ ] Reduced motion respected (if animations added)
- [ ] No console errors or warnings
- [ ] Reviewer(s) tagged

## Accessibility Verification

<!-- If this PR affects UI, verify accessibility -->

- [ ] Keyboard navigation works (Tab, Enter, Escape, Arrow keys)
- [ ] Focus indicators visible
- [ ] ARIA labels present where needed
- [ ] Screen reader tested (if applicable)
- [ ] Color contrast meets WCAG AA standards
- [ ] Respects `prefers-reduced-motion`
